content: ring repeat these 4 row 11 times in total 44 row don t forget the last purl row then return to the main instructions notes for gull wings chart scan the written instructions for number of row repeats depends on which half ring you are on vines 40 row 144 stitch half ring vines adapted from bw treasury page 218 note only the rs row are given purl back on all ws row row 1 k1 yo k2 ssk k2tog k2 yo row 3 yo k2 ssk k2tog k2 yo k1 repeat these 4 row 10 times in total 40 row don t forget the last purl row then return to the main instructions © 2010 mwaa knit obsession http //www ravelry com/designers/mwaa knit ez 100th anniversary pi shawl gull wings half circle version page 5 hearts 2 row set up plus 2 repeats of 8 row = 18 row 292 stitch border the hearts pattern was inspired by the tulip pattern in maggie righetti s knitting in plain english page 166 it was modified to reduce stitches from 12 to 9 modifications produced a simple 9 stitch and 8 row pattern note that this 8 row pattern is defined by rounds 3 10 below but i begin with rounds 1 and 2 so that the top of the first row of hearts is better defined note only the rs row are given purl back on all ws row row 1 yo ssk k2tog yo *k1 yo sk2p yo k1 yo ssk k2tog yo repeat from * complete row 1 and 2 one time only 2 row row 3 yo ssk k2tog yo *k5 yo ssk k2tog yo repeat from * row 5 yo ssk k2tog yo *k5 yo ssk k2tog yo repeat from * row 7 k4 *yo ssk k1 k2tog yo k4 repeat from * row 9 yo ssk k2tog yo *k1 yo sk2p yo k1 yo ssk k2tog yo repeat from * repeat row 3 10 two times in total 16 row row 18 don t forget the last purl row then return to the main instructions notes for hearts chart each rs row starts with the 4 stitches shown on the right knit once per row followed by the 9 stitch repeat row 1 and 2 are worked one time only row 3 to 10 are worked twice © 2010 mwaa knit obsession http //www ravelry com/designers/mwaa knit
